metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10059 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cacti before 1.1.37 has XSS because the get_current_page function in lib/functions.php relies on $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] instead of $_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'] to determine a page name.

criterions.comment: cacti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
